comment: Long day of training with a morning run long ride and gym ticked of ! Hope everyone is happy getting some miles in this weekend <URL>

# ::snt Long day of training with a morning run long ride and gym ticked of ! Hope everyone is happy getting some miles in this weekend <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (t / train-01
                  :duration (d / day
                        :ARG1-of (l / long-03)))
            :op2 (r / ride-01
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / long-03)
                  :time (d2 / date-entity
                        :dayperiod (m2 / morning)))
            :op3 (t2 / tick-03
                  :ARG1 (g / gym)))
      :snt2 (h / hope-01
            :ARG1 (h2 / happy-01
                  :ARG0 (g2 / get-01
                        :ARG0 (e / everyone)
                        :ARG1 (s / some
                              :op1 (d3 / distance-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (m3 / mile)))
                        :time (w / weekend
                              :mod (t3 / this)))
                  :ARG1 e)))
